hooks.command: bash -c 'SESSION=$(tmux display-message -p "#S" 2>/dev/null || echo "claude"); (ACTION=$(dunstify -a "Claude Code" -A "open,Open" "Claude Code — $SESSION" "Task complete"); [ "$ACTION" = "open" ] && swaymsg "[app_id=foot] focus" && tmux switch-client -t "$SESSION") &'
